description:
As a Ethereum token sharing the profits of mining system, RES Token can generate the best return on investment through a system related to newly developed mining equipment.

The mining system of KEMtechnology that organizes RES Token supplies electricity with a new and renewable energy source through the development of eco-friendly, wind, solar and hybrids, and applied VLLC(Vapor Liquid Loop Cooling) system to improve performance and longevity. Furthermore, by utilizing vanadium redoxg flow battery(VRFB)ESS system controling peak power, RES Token completed the eco-friendly Mining Infrastructure using the world’s first 100% new renewable energy.

Mining machine of RES-M1 self-researched and developed, by comsumeing about a tenth of its power compared to the existing one, is a new consept mining machine that mines 10 times the coin production of the existing mining machine. As the best mining machine in the world, it solved the performance degradation caused by heat and dust, a disadvantage of the existing mining system, with Vapor Liquid Loop Cooling and greatly improved the performance and life of miner.

50% of the coins mined will be paid on the same day in the form of airdrop to the RES token holder with being installed Smart Conduit function, the remaining 40% will be used to purchase additional miners and 10% will be used for operating fund of Mining System. Also, through Smart Voting, RES Token holders can seek to operate a transparent company and maximize its ultimate profit by directly participating in the decision-making process of running a company.
name: Renewable Energy Saving
